alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 20 at 2:40AM MDT until March 21 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the mountains above 7000 feet MSL and 2 to 6 inches in the valleys below. * WHERE...Monida Pass, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, Small, Challis, Clayton, Stanley, and Lost River Range. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin
